snippet: Nick Kyrgios has hit back at Bernard Tomic after his compatriot accused him of feigning illness to skip Australia's Davis Cup match against the United States at the weekend....
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios has hit back at Bernard Tomic after his compatriot accused him of feigning illness to skip Australia's Davis Cup match against the United States at the weekend.

headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Hits Back at Tomic in Davis Cup Row
headline.main: Kyrgios Hits Back at Tomic in Davis Cup Row
